title: Building a Production Quality Project in Python
description:
This presentation focuses on a variety of tools which can help Python
developers rapidly create production worthy projects by drawing on my
own experience in creating and deploying a Python project called Arsenal
at Rackspace in the space of a few months.

Arsenal is an open-source service designed to manage and direct a cache
of operating system images on bare-metal nodes. The goal being to
drastically reduce the time it takes to provision a node for
end-users/customers of a bare-metal cloud.

Links to information about arsenal:
https://github.com/rackerlabs/arsenal
https://arsenal.readthedocs.org/en/latest/
